text: Watching the video, I've decided I like this song and it is very relatable for anyone who has dated (especially women dating men). But there was a line about him being a "love bipolar," or something like that and as someone with bipolar, it pisses me off when people use the illness to describe people who can't make up their mind. That's not what bipolar is, and it's not a personality disorder. It is a mood disorder and you choose how to respond to those moods. Sometimes I'm manic and it used to mean I would be really productive and cheerful and peppy and a long manic episode got me on the Dean's List in university. Then depression comes out of nowhere, like I'm burnt out from the mania and I feel everything so deeply like I'm an open wound. But my opinions don't change like my moods do, in no way am I an indecisive person and I don't believe there is a mental illness that describes that, but he could be borderline, I guess.
